message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $115. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  That price is a little steep for me. Would you consider $105?
I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. After considering your offer, I am willing to sell the product for $110. This is my best offer based on the value we place on it.
I understand it's a great product, Alice. How about we meet in the middle at $107?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. Considering the value of the product, I am able to agree on a price of $108. This is my final offer.
